rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with a reception counter and built-in display.
Modern living space with integrated entertainment system, ample seating, and ambient lighting. Large window openings to ensure daylight.
Adjacent to the kitchen for casual dining; incorporates open layout design.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with integrated appliances and work counter. Vastu principles considered for placement of cooking area near the north or east side.
Spacious guest room with a private balcony.
Functional space for work or study, with ample natural light and proper ventilation.
